1370: Enekonus moved to Die Camp.D.1 after marriage.
Got married to Siwa at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Siwa, Florens, at age 21.
1371: Had a daughter with Siwa, Uergina, at age 22.
1372: Had a daughter with Siwa, Jute, at age 23.
1374: Had a son with Siwa, Hubrecht, at age 25.
1375: Had a son with Siwa, Clarebout, at age 26.
1377: Had a son with Siwa, Heideric, at age 28.
Lost son Clarebout when Clarebout was 3 years old.
1378: Had a son with Siwa, Segher, at age 29.
1382: Had a son with Siwa, Gheldekin, at age 33.
1384: Lost daughter Uergina when Uergina was 14 years old.
1385: Had a son with Siwa, Kerstiaen, at age 36.
Lost son Hubrecht when Hubrecht was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Lost his wife Siwa while she was giving birth to Trove in 1386.
